original_title: Hootie & the Blowfish: Summer Camp with Trucks
overview: A collection of pop promos from the American band. Their debut album, 'Cracked Rear View', sold a staggering 12 million copies in the States making it one of the top five debuts of all time. Although they have not had as much success in Britain, they remain a popular band, and their top singles are all featured.
title: Hootie & the Blowfish: Summer Camp with Trucks
